questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) A giant ape on a building

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) A landscape
B) A building and a giant creature
C) A family gathering
D) A beach scene

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A giant creature on top of a building
C) A group of people
D) A body of water

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) A cityscape
C) A forest
D) A beach

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A fence and railing
B) A lake
C) A group of animals
D) A picnic table

A) Harmony between nature and humans
B) Conflict between a giant creature and airplanes
C) A family enjoying a day out

A) A cottage
B) A skyscraper

B) A giant ape

D) A giant cat

D) Helicopters

D) A forest

A) Black and white
B) Colorful
C) Sepia
D) Monochrome

A) They are part of a parade

A) Smaller than the airplanes
